action.action-desc: Mr. Williams introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Reserve Act to revise the membership of Federal Open Market Committee, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the FOMC Representation Improvement Act.

section.header: Membership of Federal Open Market Committee
section.text: Section 12A(a) of the Federal Reserve Act (12 U.S.C. 263(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking five representatives of the Federal Reserve banks to be selected as hereinafter provided and inserting one representative from each of the Federal Reserve banks;
in the second sentence, by striking and, beginning and all that follows through San Francisco; and
by striking the third and fourth sentences.
